welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gliwice, Poland! With its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant cultural scene, this charming city is known for its warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Gliwice has to offer.

restaurants.name: Wine Bar Lofty
restaurants.description: Wine Bar Lofty is a gastropub located in Gliwice.

restaurants.name: szAMMa
restaurants.description: szAMMa is a modern european restaurant located in Gliwice.

restaurants.name: Kafo Kawiarnia
restaurants.description: Kafo Kawiarnia is a café located in Gliwice.

restaurants.name: Bar Teatralny
restaurants.description: Bar Teatralny is a eastern european restaurant located in Gliwice.

restaurants.name: Wanilia Restauracja & Café
restaurants.description: Wanilia Restauracja & Café is a italian restaurant located in Gliwice.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and entering their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
